title: WTB: a few T206 HOF's PSA/SGC 4-5
author: ZiggerZagger

posts.post_title: WTB: a few T206 HOF's PSA/SGC 4-5
posts.post_content:
Working on the remaining HOF's for my personal collection of T206 HOF's, and have had great help over the years from folks on the board.

Hoping to add PSA or SGC 4.0 - 5.0 with good centering and eye appeal.   Happy to pay a premium for nicer examples, as is only fair.


Here's the list:
J. Beckley (KC)
Chief Bender  (no trees)
R. Bresnahan  (Batting)
F. Clarke  (Batting)
S. Crawford  (both Throwing and With Bat)
E. Flick
C. Griffith  (Portrait)
M. Huggins  (Portrait)
H. Jennings  (Portrait)
W. Keeler  (With Bat)
J. Kelley
R. Marquard  (Pitching)
J. McGraw  (both Portraits and Finger in Air)
J. Tinker  (Bat Off and Hands on Knees)
B. Wallage
Ed Walsh
V. Willis  (Batting and Throwing)
Cy Young  (Bare Hand)


Any help is appreciated.  Payment is via PayPal F&F, or your method of choice.   
Thanks in advance!
I have a very nice SGC50 it is stunning and is an example that you would really like....lmk

[quote name="823dek" post=1844503]I have a very nice SGC50 it is stunning and is an example that you would really like....lmk[/QUOTE]

DK--

Thanks for reaching out regarding the Clarke.  Interested, and have PM'ed and Emailed for a scan at your convenience.
